attributes.cardDescription: A step-by-step guide to obtaining a driver's license in California through the Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV).

steps.name: Prepare Required Documents
steps.cardDescription: Gather your Social Security Number, proof of identity (passport, birth certificate), and proof of California residency (utility bills, rental agreement).

steps.name: Complete Form DL 44
steps.cardDescription: Fill out the California Driver's License application form (DL 44). This form must be submitted in person and cannot be downloaded.

steps.name: Study for Written Test
steps.cardDescription: Study the California Driver Handbook and take practice tests to prepare for the written knowledge test.

steps.name: Schedule DMV Appointment
steps.cardDescription: Book an appointment at your local DMV office online or by calling 1-800-777-0133 to avoid long wait times.

steps.name: Visit DMV Office
steps.cardDescription: Bring all required documents, submit your application, provide fingerprints, take a vision test, and pay the application fee.

steps.name: Pass Written Test
steps.cardDescription: Take and pass the written knowledge test. You must answer at least 30 out of 36 questions correctly to pass.

steps.name: Have Photo Taken
steps.cardDescription: If you pass the written test, you'll have your photo taken for your license.

steps.name: Receive Temporary License
steps.cardDescription: You'll receive a temporary paper license valid for 60 days while your permanent license is being processed.

steps.name: Schedule Behind-the-Wheel Test
steps.cardDescription: Schedule your driving test. New drivers must wait at least 14 days after getting their permit before taking the driving test.

steps.name: Take Behind-the-Wheel Test
steps.cardDescription: Bring a properly registered and insured vehicle for your driving test. You'll be evaluated on your driving skills and knowledge of road rules.

steps.name: Receive Official License
steps.cardDescription: If you pass your driving test, you'll receive your official California driver's license by mail within 3-4 weeks.
